name: TOA - DUNGEONS CARNAGE
description:
Efrain Lamydosk is an ambitious Arcane Warrior of Herkryon who decided to try to find the Diamond Sun that may grant him an invaluable physical and magical power. The diamond is located in the bowels of a dungeon full of monsters thirsty for human blood.

Have fun with this 3D action game in the classic style. A lot of blood, guts and brains pixelated for you! ;)
